dataList.name: Deathrite【Haste】
dataList.desc:
- Base Stack: 3
- When getting Rupture triggered by getting hit by an Attack Skill from a target with 10+ Speed, lose 1 Stack and gain +1 Rupture Count
- At 0 Stack, take Gluttony damage equal to Rupture Potency on self; then, this effect expires
※ Cannot gain additional Stacks of this effect while it is already active
dataList.summary: If conditions are met: inflict Gluttony bonus damage

dataList.name: Strider【Mao】
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 3
Turn End: gain 5 Haste next turn
Reduced by 1 at Turn End
dataList.summary: If conditions are met: inflict Gluttony bonus damage

dataList.name: Deception
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +10% damage against the target

dataList.name: Deception
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's or when using an Unopposed Attack, deal +20% damage against the target; if this unit's Speed is faster than the target's, take -20% damage

dataList.name: Repressed Bloodthirst
dataList.desc:
Base Offense Level -10
Base Defense Level -10

dataList.name: Crushed Bloodthirst
dataList.desc:
Base Offense Level -25
Base Defense Level -25

dataList.name: The Middle's Vendetta Mark
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 10
When attacked by The Middle, take +3% damage per Stack (max 30%)

dataList.name: Persistence
dataList.desc:
Max Stack: 4
When taking lethal damage, 80% chance to not take that damage, heal 60 HP, recover from Stagger, and lose this effect

The above effects do not activate under the following conditions:
- When the Coin damage taken exceeds this unit's max HP
- When this unit has the HP Healing Down effect
Reduced by 1 at Turn End

dataList.name: Night in the Backstreets
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Turn Start: gain 1 Attack Power Up, 1 HP Healing Boost, and 1 Fragile

dataList.name: Night in the Backstreets
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Turn Start: gain 2 Attack Power Up, 2 HP Healing Boost, and 1 Fragile
